pullrequest.title: Initial commit for new installation pages

content.raw:
> adding uninstall instructions for binaries

+1. On Ubuntu, `sudo apt remove ignition-citadel && sudo apt autoremove` should remove all the citadel libraries. Not sure about brew, do you know, @{5d3f35705e485d0dab01c896} ?

> Does that apply only to macOS, or Ubuntu, or both?

It currently applies for Ubuntu. Since the rendering window is not working on Mac yet, we could point users to an issue about not supporting the client right now (i.e. headless mode only). @{557058:10b01d41-a2e9-4a41-a907-e6e2f03b6cd5} , I don't think we have an issue for that, do we?
content.html:
adding uninstall instructions for binaries

+1. On Ubuntu, sudo apt remove ignition-citadel && sudo apt autoremove should remove all the citadel libraries. Not sure about brew, do you know, @Claire Wang ?

Does that apply only to macOS, or Ubuntu, or both?

It currently applies for Ubuntu. Since the rendering window is not working on Mac yet, we could point users to an issue about not supporting the client right now (i.e. headless mode only). @Ian Chen , I don't think we have an issue for that, do we?
